game.name: DESTROYER BURGER
game.shortDescription: DESTROYER BURGER is the 4th best independent fast food simulator game of 2025! Featuring frenetic multi-tasking madness where you assemble burgers in the Kitchen and serve them up in the Front Desk, DESTROYER BURGER is a game of chaos management.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DESTROYER BURGER is the 4th best independent fast food simulator game of 2025! Featuring frenetic multi-tasking madness where you assemble burgers in the Kitchen and serve them up in the Front Desk, DESTROYER BURGER is a game of chaos management.
